channel.title: Making it so when you go in a portal, you have to be on a certain client?
channel.description:
Hi coders,
This is complicated but I want to make a portal which teleports you, to varrock for example. But you need to be using my client to go. How can I make it like this? Example;
If a player clicks on the portal using my webclient, it would to varrock. But if a player is using another client then my webclient it would say: You need to be using the webclient to enter here!
Is this even possible? Is there a way to do this? If so, how :|
Thank you very much for taking the time to read my post!
|||Park|||

item.title: Making it so when you go in a portal, you have to be on a certain client?

@parkview wrote:

Hmm…not a bad idea. Thanks for the help

item.title: Making it so when you go in a portal, you have to be on a certain client?
item.dc:creator: @CupofTea CupofTea
item.description:
@CupofTea wrote:

I dont know how to do that,
But i do have another idea,
If the player enters the portal,
Set a item on the ground that is onley visible with your client.
Probably make’s him Disconnect or Lagg,
Just when you enter portal,
Let it say the line:
WARNING: Need my client to enter or something.

Read full topic
